from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        x = SortedList()
        y = SortedList()
        res = 1000000000
        for [u, v] in points:
            x.add(u + v)
            y.add(u - v)
        for [u, v] in points:
            x.remove(u + v)
            y.remove(u - v)
            
            res = min(res, max(x[-1] - x[0], y[-1] - y[0]))
            
            x.add(u + v)
            y.add(u - v)
        return res
